casebody.data:
IN RE APPLICATION OF OHIO POWER CO. 2017-0752 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MISCELLANEOUS ORDERS

Sua sponte, parties ordered to file a response, if any, to intervening appellee's suggestion of mootness no later than 12:00 p.m. on Friday, November 9, 2018. This entry supersedes the entry issued by the court in this case on November 1, 2018.
